meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of photographic sensitivity.
meanings.sent1: The sensitometric analysis helped determine the best film for low-light photography.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician conducted a sensitometric test to assess the film's sensitivity.
meanings.sent3: The sensitometric experiments in the darkroom sometimes made the photographer feel like a scientist.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of sensitometric properties was as clear as a well-exposed photograph.
meanings.sent5: The sensitometric scale made it easy to compare different films' sensitivity levels.

meanings.definition: The study or measurement of the sensitivity of photographic materials.
meanings.sent1: Learning about sensitometric techniques can improve your photography skills.
meanings.sent2: Sensitometric is crucial in understanding how different films react to light.
meanings.sent3: The class on sensitometric was so interesting that even the camera shy students enjoyed it.
meanings.sent4: In the world of photography, sensitometric is like uncovering the secrets of light.
meanings.sent5: The book on sensitometric opened up a whole new world of photographic possibilities.

meanings.definition: A method of determining the sensitivity of photographic materials.
meanings.sent1: The sensitometric process involves exposing films to controlled light conditions.
meanings.sent2: Photographers rely on sensitometric to choose the right film for each situation.
meanings.sent3: During the sensitometric experiment, the film seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The art of sensitometric is like decoding the language of light in photography.
meanings.sent5: Her mastery of sensitometric techniques elevated her photography to a whole new level.
